value.title: Q&A Visualization - Natural Language Generation Visualization in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: In this vLog, we will discuss about new rolled out feature by Microsoft during October 2019 update which is new Q&A visualization for the Power BI Desktop. value.title: Capture a Profiler trace for Power BI Desktop!
